pros: International environment and contact with students is motivating. The spirit is young and people are mostly very engaged. There are many opportunities for research and professional development if you find the time. Generally speaking, low hierarchical attitude, which is very pleasant. As a large organization, processes tend to get complicated sometimes.
cons: The new career model has had a negative impact on general motivation. Lack of spaces for people and students to work. Totally limited possibilities for presenting content on the own website and lack of innovative thinking when it comes to this subject.
